entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of drizzle beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
